name: Nexa SDK
tagline: Run, build & ship local AI in minutes
description: Nexa SDK runs any model on any device, across any backend locally‚Äîtext, vision, audio, speech, or image generation‚Äîon NPU, GPU, or CPU. It supports Qualcomm and Apple NPUs, GGUF, Apple MLX, and the latest SOTA models (Gemma3n, PaddleOCR).

name: Deamoy
tagline: Vibe code your app, then visually perfect it
description: Inspired by Figma‚Äôs craft and Lovable‚Äôs magic, Deamoy fuses the best of both: streamable JIT rendering, AI and visual edits in perfect sync, and editable sites from a single prompt in seconds. The fastest, freest AI app builder is here.

name: Integrity
tagline: Unified project brain: docs, canvases, and AI chats together
description: Integrity is the unified project brain where notes, canvases, and AI chats become connected layers of thought. Move seamlessly from structure to vision, and co-create with the top AI models, grounded in your work.

name: Fern
tagline: Instant Docs and SDKs for your API
description: Start with an API spec. Generate SDKs in multiple languages and interactive API documentation tailored to your brand.

name: Linkie
tagline: Like Linktree, but sexier and unbranded
description: Linkie is a customizable link-in-bio tool that lets creators and businesses showcase all their important links, content, and products in one sleek, unbranded page - perfect for sharing across social media. Custom domain, analytics, email collection, and more.

name: opencode zen
tagline: AI models recommended for developers by the opencode team
description: opencode zen is a curated, ‚Äúready-to-use‚Äù gateway of tested models optimized for coding agents. It integrates as an optional provider within opencode, offering pay-as-you-go access to top models (e.g. GPT-5, Claude, Grok) with no lock-in.

name: Harmony
tagline: Aesthetic Pomodoro Productivity App
description: Harmony is your FREE all-in-one focus app! üéß Escape to cozy virtual spaces with aesthetic videos & ambient sounds. Use our custom Pomodoro timer to crush your tasks with an integrated To-Do list. Get unstuck, build streaks, and find your flow! ‚ú®üß†‚úÖüî•

name: Onsen
tagline: AI companion for mental health
description: Onsen is an AI companion for mental health, emotional support and life coaching. Experience the warmth of a trusted friend, the wisdom of a life coach, and the support of a mental wellness advisor, anytime, anywhere, for you.

name: ProsperPath
tagline: The light at the end of the tunnel to your financial freedom
description: Stop feeling trapped by debt. ProsperPath shows you the light at the end of the tunnel by mapping your journey to financial freedom. You'll see exactly how each small step leads you out of money stress. There's always a way out - let us show you yours.

name: MARK¬Æ
tagline: The first AI bookmark for physical readers
description: Unlock your intellectual potential. Mark is an AI-powered ecosystem that transforms reading into a smarter, connected experience. Enhance retention, track progress, and spark curiosity with beautifully designed tools that bridge print and digital learning.

name: rankioz.com
tagline: All-in-one seo tool for competitor & keyword analysis
description: Boost your SEO rankings with Rankioz. Analyze competitors, research keywords, and optimize your content with ease to rank higher on Google.

name: Ragie: Agent-Ready RAG-as-a-Service
tagline: Smarter RAG with Agentic Retrieval & Context-Aware MCP
description: The next generation of Ragie introduces Agentic Retrieval for multi-step AI workflows and the world's first Context-Aware MCP Server for accurate and predictable tool routing. Ragie is Enterprise-ready with GDPR, SOC 2, and HIPAA compliance. Try for free.

name: NFTotem
tagline: Turn your NFT collection into a living tower
description: NFTotem shows your NFT portfolio as a living tower, where each block is a collection you hold. Safe wallet connection via delegate.xyz, powered by OpenSea + Alchemy, with 100+ hand-drawn, handpicked collections.

name: Hoodiely
tagline: Tweet to shirt
description: Create custom shirts by tweeting! Mention @HoodielyHQ in any tweet or reply and get a unique, personalized shirt design. High-quality printing, worldwide shipping. Pay only if you love it.

name: NoSignupTools
tagline: Directory of free online tools that require no signup
description: NoSignupTools is a curated directory of free, high-quality online tools that don't require users to sign up or create an account - just fast, private, and secure access whenever you need it.

name: Kodle
tagline: Tamil movie mystery game
description: Guess today's tamil movie in 5 chances

name: Creators 200
tagline: Forbes List for Creators
description: Discover the most followed people online. Weekly updated rankings tracking top 200 creator growth across YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, and more. Real-time ranking showing the most followed creators across platforms.

name: DevWorkspace Pro
tagline: Build Docker-powered Web Apps with Supercharged Productivity
description: DevWorkspace Pro is the most intuitive GUI for DDEV. More than just a UI for the powerful DDEV CLI, it adds smart features and workflows that boost your productivity and efficiency.

name: Liquid Nanos
tagline: Frontier‚Äëgrade performance on everyday devices
description: Liquid Nanos are a family of small, specialized foundation models from Liquid AI. They are designed to run on-device for tasks like data extraction, RAG, and tool use, delivering frontier-grade performance without the cloud.

name: Dictly
tagline: Real-time dictation. Styled, in place.
description: Transform speech to styled text instantly with Dictly. 100% on-device voice dictation for macOS, iOS & iPadOS. ~180ms latency, complete privacy, works in any text field. Available on the Apple App Store!
